Valida Pau / The Information:
Dealogic: 51 US tech IPOs raised $16.8B in 2025, driven by AI and crypto, above the past three-year average but far below 2021's 127 IPOs raising $74.4B  —  The drought in initial public offerings ended this year, led by big winners in AI and crypto, but gains were rare for companies outside those industries.

The current AI strategies of China and the US are complementary, as unlike the US, China isn't “AGI-pilled” yet, focusing on embodied AI and open source models  —  Thoughts on US-China Competition  —  The United States and China are often said to be in a “race” with one another with respect to artificial intelligence.

items.title: 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – Up to $900 off early Black Friday deals on gaming gear, Steam Machine, PlayStation monitor, more
items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Battlestation Weekly – your go-to spot for the notable deals and latest releases in PC gaming at a glance every Saturday morning. We’re continuing to track some solid early Black Friday deals that starting rolling in last week. Many of the Singles’ Day offers on gaming laptops and desktops are still live as well, which you can snag along with the fresh lows we tracked on monitors, Copilot+ PCs, and more courtesy of Best Buy and Walmart. And while we were busy highlighting the best early Black Friday deals, Valve decided to drop its big hardware announcement, confirming the launch of an all-new Steam Machine, Steam Frame, and a Steam Controller. We also got a new Backbone Pro Xbox Edition controller and Sony’s first PlayStation-branded gaming monitor this week. You can learn more about all of them and catch the week’s best deals below in this week’s Battlestation Weekly.

items.title: Black Friday 2025 deal schedule: Best Buy, Amazon, Costco, LEGO, Google, Nintendo, more [Update #6]
items.summary:
The 2025 Black Friday deal season is upon us and early details from the major retailers are starting to flood in. This year we are already getting official confirmation from many of the biggest retailers and brands on when you can expect the Black Friday and Thanksgiving deals to begin and it looks like we are going to be getting a full month worth of big-time discounts in 2025. Deals are actually kicking off on October 31 this year and carrying right through to Thanksgiving 2025 and Black Friday with various sale events throughout the month of November.

Another week deeper into November means another week of early Black Friday deals, and we’ve got plenty to get excited about for you. From the first-ever savings on Velotric’s Nomad 2X Multi-Terrain Full Suspension e-bike with $96 in FREE gear at $2,299 shipped and Ride1Up’s TrailRush German Mid-Drive e-bike at $1,995 shipped to new releases like EcoFlow’s DELTA 3 1000 Air Portable Power Station starting from $299 shipped, there are loads of deals to get excited for from this week. Head below to check out all the best Green Deals we’ve collected for you.

items.title: AirTag is sitting at the $18 Prime shipped all-time low right now – load up on Apple stocking stuffers while you can
items.summary:
The early Black Friday deal on AirTag might be one of the best stocking stuffers you can score this year. Apple gifts are, well…epic, but they can also be very expensive. Whether it be for stocking stuffers, corporate gifts, or a little something for co-workers, gift cards are great, maybe a candle or a bottle of wine – I can very much appreciate any of those things, but there’s not many things sweeter than unwrapping a gift to find Apple packaging hiding underneath. And you can make it happen for just $18 Prime shipped right now.
